text: “Cng raluk khna thi phracea khxng cea prathan xongkar kæ mla xik ah wa thæcring kha nan rwm xyu kab phwk cea dwy dangnan phwk cea cng thahı brrda phu sraththa mankhng theid kha ca yon khwam klaw kheapi nı hawcı khxng brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa læw phwk cea cng fan lng bn kankhx læa cng fan thuk «swn playkh xng niw mux cak phwk khea”
